```{r setup, include=FALSE}
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
if (!require("knitr")) {
   install.packages("knitr")
   library(knitr)
}
if (!require("pander")) {
   install.packages("pander")
   library(pander)
}
if (!require("plotly")) {
   install.packages("plotly")
   library(plotly)
}
if (!require("ggplot2")) {
   install.packages("ggplot2")
   library(ggplot2)
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
                  fig.width=3, 
                  fig.height=3, 
                  fig.retina=12,
                  out.width = "100%",
                  cache = FALSE,
                  echo = TRUE,
                  message = FALSE, 
                  warning = FALSE,
                  hiline = TRUE
                  )
```
